title: Monounsaturated fats help roundworms live longer, researchers say

title_detail.value: Monounsaturated fats help roundworms live longer, researchers say

summary: Pudgy roundworms storing a particular type of fat live longer than their more svelte counterparts, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: Pudgy roundworms storing a particular type of fat live longer than their more svelte counterparts, according to a new study.
